title: Environment in the balance
brief_description: Shows how geological, topographical and social developments in Britain have helped to shape its present environment and discusses the problems of industrial expansion, population growth and pollution.
description: Shows how geological, topographical and social developments in Britain have helped to shape its present environment and discusses the problems of industrial expansion, population growth and pollution.
